Begin exercising 
gradually with 10 
minute bouts of 
moderate intensity 
continuous exercise 
building up to a total of 150 
minutes across the week.
Exercise tips
• Exercise doesn’t have to be 
strenuous	to	be	beneficial.
• Make sure that you warm 
up and cool down.
• Try to keep active on a 
daily basis. Half an hour 
of walking each day can 
be enough. If you cannot 
manage that, any amount is 
better than nothing.
• Avoid any strenuous 
exercise in hot weather.
• Drink ple
